title: Sami Luhtanen in Distorted Reality re-edited part
description:
Three years ago he had no sponsors and didn't speak a word of English. This year, the "Silent Killer" has been the revelation of the international snowboarding scene. Meet a snowboarding legend in the making: Sami Luhtanen.

Filming: Pirate Movie Production
Editing: Julien Mazard
Music: Talisco "So Old"
(p) & © Roy Music
Motion: Thibault Roqueirol

asset.hookText: Three years ago he had no sponsors and didn't speak a word of English. This year, the "Silent Killer" has been the revelation of the international snowboarding scene. Meet a snowboarding legend in the making: Sami Luhtanen.
